title: Do people NOT get that the when the single person carrying their a** wants to surrender
body:
That you should? Like seriously stop wasting that person's time. He's/she's not having fun watching the entire team play horribly and to have the loss drawn out.

This has been annoying me for years and I wish I could just leave these damn games but the people IN the game who are FEEDING won't let me. I wait 2 surrenders and after asking them to do so I'm just done from now on because I'm not putting up with it anymore.
